### 一、解释，判断答案是否正确。

#### 二、根据情景和逻辑进行判断

As they go around town, the police help people. Sometimes they find lost children. They take the children home. If the police see a girl, they put an end to it right away. Sometimes people will ask the police how to go to a place in town. The police can always tell the people which way to go. They know all the streets and roads well.

In the text, "put an end to" means "______".

A. stop  
B. cut  
C. kill  
D. fly  

根据文章提供的场景，如果警察看到有人在打架，他们会怎么做？因为制止打架斗殴是警察的职责，故 A。

---

#### 三、根据并列或因果关系猜测词义

There is a place on our earth where hot water and steam come up under the ground. It is on a large island in the Pacific Ocean. The island is North Island in New Zealand.

What does the word "steam" mean in Chinese?

A. 自来水  
B. 火气  
C. 水汽  
D. 蒸汽  

从语法上看，steam和hot water是并列关系，故从词义推测相关。

#### 四、根据情景和常识判断

The following morning when I went to see him my captive (caged) bird was doing. I discovered in the floor of the cage, I was terribly surprised! What had happened? I had taken extremely care of my little bird. About Wayne, the famous ornithologist who happened to be visiting my father at the time, hearing me crying.
